name: @unitario/angular-devkit
description: Software Development Kit for Angular developed by Unitario

scripts.clean: yarn run remove && yarn run create && echo 'Clean completed'.
scripts.remove: yarn run remove:package && yarn run remove:test && echo 'Remove completed.'
scripts.remove:test: rm -f -r __tests__/builders/node_modules && rm -f -r ./__tests__/builders/dist && rm -f -r __tests__/builders-app/dist && rm -f -r __tests__/builders-app/node_modules && echo 'Test resources removed.'
scripts.remove:package: rm -f -r ./dist && rm -f -r node_modules && echo 'Package resources removed.'
scripts.create: yarn run create:package && yarn run build:package && yarn run create:test && yarn run build:test && echo 'Create completed.'
scripts.create:test: cd __tests__/builders && yarn install --silent && cd ../builders-app && yarn install --silent && echo 'Test resources created'
scripts.build: yarn run build:package && yarn run build:test
